Interface Client

All Superinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientIIOP, ClientJRMP
public interface Client
extends java.lang.Runnable, java.io.Serializable

Definisce i metodi comuni a tutti i tipi di client, siano essi studenti, professori o amministratori

uniBCM Team
